explains: adj. 用花装饰的；花开着的
wordGroup: flower arrangement 插花，鲜花装饰
cut flower n. 切花，鲜切花；插瓶花
jasmine flower 茉莉花茶，茉莉花
flower girl 卖花女；婚礼中持花少女

sentences.en: She was clothed in a flowered dress.
sentences.cn: 她穿了一件碎花连衣裙。

sentences.en: She was wearing a flowered cotton dress.
sentences.cn: 她身着一件印花棉布裙。

sentences.en: Sue was sitting up in bed, looking very fetching in a flowered bedjacket.
sentences.cn: 她挺身坐在床上，穿着印花睡衣，看起来很迷人。
